it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.filters.particlefilter

Class ParticleFilter<T extends Particle>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.filters.particlefilter.ParticleFilter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateEstimationFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndoorParticleFilter

    public class ParticleFilter<T extends Particle>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateEstimationFilter
    This is a concrete class for Particle Filters. Actually this is just an empty (enriched) shell: the policies for updating, filtering, regenerating and picking the position as a result must be injected. Note that strategies and the particles collection might be mutable.
